tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE smart_contracts (
    contract_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_name VARCHAR(255),
    contract_code TEXT,
    metadata JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE contract_executions (
    execution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    deployment_id INT REFERENCES contract_deployments(deployment_id),
    execution_date TIMESTAMP,
    execution_status VARCHAR(20),
    execution_result JSON
);

CREATE TABLE contract_owners (
    owner_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT,
    owner_name TEXT,
    owner_address TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES smart_contracts(contract_id)
);

CREATE TABLE execution_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT,
    execution_date TIMESTAMP,
    execution_status TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES smart_contracts(contract_id)
);

CREATE TABLE contract_events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT,
    event_name TEXT,
    event_date TIMESTAMP,
    event_details JSONB,
    FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES smart_contracts(contract_id)
);

CREATE TABLE contract_storage (
    storage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT,
    storage_key TEXT,
    storage_value JSONB,
    FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES smart_contracts(contract_id)
);
